post.body:
Transitioning over to ZeroNet now that the US Government is allowing Big Tech to censor the citizens here...

Communism is likely innevitable at this point, but I will keep trying my best...

https://OTB-Technologies.com to find me on Diaspora*

Let's #MakeAmericaFreeAgain
#OTB4PreSid3nT

comment.body: Bitcoin is decentralized and it seems damn near everyone has used it to some degree by now. He is refering to the fact that people are waking up in general I believe. They are becoming aware of what has been being done for far too long to them. Decentralization is the future. I gave a speech on it at work last year once when I worked downtown here and it gathered quite a crowd lol.
There will be more using these types of services soon though; just watch.
Let's decentralize the world together now; shall we?

@Roadisroad: how not? It seems the majority of people here are promoting communist and socialist ideas without realizing it. They all think Trump is bad now because of their TVs! 
What do you think?

I have a handful of people on my side, bit most listen to the TV. I tell them what is going on in Europe right now and they say "Really?!?!!" It is all censored. And they are also censoring all the protests in favor of Trump and only show what is going to make him lose on the TV and now they have censored our internet on the surface web too so as to influence the public opinion to vote for Biden who I believe is pure evil. Horrible person.

It shouldn't be that I have to communicate via the deep web in order not to be censored unless a country is falling into tyranny. This is very bad now. Even the doctors here are being censored. What can I do?

They tell the people to listen to them or else they say they are "conspiracy theorists" and the government here wants to make thinking like that illegal!

You hear me?! They want to make thinking illegal in the USA right now!
Lol! My old blind used to do this all the time. Made me so mad haha
